result.arabic_text: وَإِذَا نَادَيۡتُمۡ إِلَى ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱتَّخَذُوهَا هُزُوٗا وَلَعِبٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَعۡقِلُونَ
result.translation: When you give the call to prayer[51], they ridicule it and make fun of it; that is because they are people who have no understanding.
result.footnotes: [51] Al-Salāh (prayer) is singled out here for it is the most apparent distinctive feature of the Muslim community.
